field_not_aggregatable.text: Field "{{fieldName}}" is not an aggregatable field.

over_field_cardinality.text: Cardinality of over_field "{{fieldName}}" is below 10 and might be less suitable for population analysis.

partition_field_cardinality.text: Cardinality of partition_field "{{fieldName}}" is above 100 and might result in high memory usage. Consider using an over_field.

bucket_span_estimation_mismatch.text: Current bucket span is "{{currentBucketSpan}}", but bucket span estimation returned "{{estimateBucketSpan}}".

bucket_span_high.text: Bucket span is 1 day or more. Be aware that days are considered as UTC days, not local days.
